message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product that I think you'll love. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $820000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not comfortable meeting you at $820000. I'm willing to consider a price of $850000. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $850000. Would you be willing to meet me at $810000?
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to consider a price of $835000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $835000. Would you be willing to meet me at $815000?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $825000. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $825000. I'm willing to meet you at $815000. This is my final offer.

I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I'm going to have to pass on your offer. I think we're too far apart. I'm going to sell the product to John for $800000. Good luck with your search for a similar product.
